mapper.insert: insert into index_pathology_icd( person_id, unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, pathology_id, diagnosis_icdcode, diagnosis_icddesc, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{pathologyId}, #{diagnosisIcdcode}, #{diagnosisIcddesc}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update index_pathology_icd set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, pathology_id = #{pathologyId}, diagnosis_icdcode = #{diagnosisIcdcode}, diagnosis_icddesc = #{diagnosisIcddesc}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
